section.title: DNS Service Overview
section.p: DNS Service provides multi-tenant Domain Name Service with REST API management for domain and records. The DNS Service is not intended to be used as an internal or private DNS service. The name records in DNSaaS should be treated as public information which anyone could query. There are controls to prevent tenants from creating records for domains they do not own. TSIG provides a transaction signature to ensure integrity during zone transfer to other DNS servers.
